title: Revenue Trend (Daily)
query: SELECT t AS time, (100000 + 20000*sin(extract(epoch from t)/86400*2*pi()) + (random()*5000))::numeric AS value FROM generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '1 day') AS t

title: Active Users (Hourly)
query: SELECT t AS time, (500 + 200*sin(extract(epoch from t)/3600) + random()*50)::numeric AS value FROM generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '1 hour') AS t

title: Sales by Category
query: SELECT label, value FROM (VALUES ('Electronics', 120), ('Home', 85), ('Fashion', 65)) AS x(label, value)

title: Error Rate (%)
query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('minute', now()) AS time, (random()*10)::numeric AS value

title: Orders (Line - ECharts)
query: SELECT generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '1 hour') AS time, (random()*50+50)::int AS value

title: Inventory Table
query: SELECT 'SKU-001' AS label, 150 AS value UNION ALL SELECT 'SKU-002' AS label, 90 AS value UNION ALL SELECT 'SKU-003' AS label, 45 AS value

title: Marketing Spend (Weekly)
query: SELECT t AS time, (20000 + 5000*sin(extract(epoch from t)/604800*2*pi()) + random()*1000)::numeric AS value FROM generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '1 day') AS t

title: Regional Orders
query: SELECT label, value FROM (VALUES ('North', 1200), ('South', 950), ('East', 1300), ('West', 800)) AS x(label, value)

title: Business KPI (Composite)
query: SELECT t AS time, (200 + 80*sin(extract(epoch from t)/86400*2*pi()) + random()*20)::numeric AS value FROM generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '1 day') AS t
